tagline: A gaming oriented fork from http://code.google.com/p/wjoy/
body:
### WJoy+
Is a fun project to play your favorite videogames or emulators using a wiimote as gamepad.

### Which games can I play?
Check our [Compatibility List](https://github.com/psyrax/wjoyplus/wiki/Compatibility-List)

### Authors and Contributors
This is a fork of [WJoy](http://code.google.com/p/wjoy/ )
name: Wjoyplus
